author: Mark Twain
message: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: I may not know everything, but everything is not known yet anyway.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly, our whole life would change.
title: Thought of the day

author: Carl Jung
message: Without this playing with fantasy no creative work has ever yet come to birth. The debt we owe to the play of the imagination is incalculable.
title: Thought of the day
